name: Mirror Image
overview:
Mirror Image® Internet, a global Dynamic Delivery Network for online content, application and transaction delivery, provides Content Delivery, Streaming Media, Edge Computing and Reporting solutions that offer customers a smarter way to create more engaging Web experiences for users worldwide. With an enterprise-class platform combining an optimal mix of connectivity, processing power and storage, Mirror Image gives retail, advertising, media and government organizations the control they need to deliver the Right Content to the Right Customer at the Right Time.

Mirror Image is a subsidiary of Xcelera Inc. and has been delivering Internet infrastructure services since 1999. Mirror Image increases revenue opportunities, reduces infrastructure costs and improves customer satisfaction for Global 2000 enterprises, e-Business and hosting providers worldwide through its corporate headquarters in Tewksbury, Massachusetts.
